entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: Beauxbatons is described as a school with a carriage that looks like a large, chilly, frosted pumpkin.

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: Durmstrang is described as a school with a ship's portholes glazed with ice and rigging white with frost.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is mentioned as a student who complains about the food served at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is described as a school with a Great Hall and house-elves in the kitchen serving stews and puddings.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as a student who is keen not to be spotted by Fleur.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as a student who teases Fleur about her complaints and asks Ron about his plans for the ball.

relationships.description: Fleur Delacour is a student at Hogwarts.
Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger are friends, as evidenced by their conversation in the Great Hall.
